choices: In a bowl of corn flakes
1.content:
You get up slowly, regaining vision a steady pace. Once you gain your baring on where you are, you come to the realization you are two inches tall and........

(These beginning choices will decide a character name for you and how long you will survive the story. For example, if you choose "In a bowl of corn flakes" how long do you think your character is making it out alive lol. The choice where you are standing in the living room is a lot longer in length and will have much character development and story. The other choices do not explain much of what is going on so you may want to come back to these later. Though, if you prefer less story and more to the point, the other choices are perfect for that.)
1.title: Where in this house do you awake at?

choices: Go ask the man your questions
Head towards where she entered the room
Start yelling to get her attention
12.content:
You start to grasp you are shrunk and located in what appears to be a living room. In the distance of the hard wood floor you stand on, you see a coffee table and a couch. "This cannot be happening." You muttered to yourself. You continue to scan the area, and notice a kitchen past the living room, opposite to the kitchen an arch way which appears to lead into what you'd assume are bedrooms, and a stand towards your backside.

"Over here!"
You look around puzzled.
"Under the chest now! The goddess approachs!"
You then feel slight vibrations in the floor, and smacking akin to footsteps barefeet make on such a floor. "*Yawn*
Your ears hear a very feminine yawn which you then turned in direction to. "Holy shit." You manage to say as a half naked giant woman walks towards the couch in the distance. This beautey is wearing black and pink short shorts and a black bra only. Her skin is flawless as is her black long hair with a tiny stripe of pink. You watch as she lays down on the couch and grabs her phone from the table. You look to the guy that yelled from the stand, then back at this woman. "Do I trust this man at my size? Maybe he can help me out. Although this woman is huge and may very well be able to figure my situation out. Plus, maybe I might have a chance with her if I can get back to my own height."
12.title: A Goddesses Dwelling

124.content:
You bellow out help the loudest you can yell it.
"The goddess surly will take you into the heavens if you keep yelling for her my son!" The guy under the stand yelled.

You ignore him because you think you got her attention. She sits up and looks over at your direction. "Ah, another guest." The woman said as she stood up.
You start to think this was a bad idea. In seconds, she stood before you. You slowly bring your vision up to her face.
Looking straight at you she says, "You wanted my attention and I don't know if you noticed, I just woke up. So say something that will amuse me or.....*she seductively bites her finger* I slowly crush you under my foot."
"I...I....you are gorgeous! Just don't kill me! I will do anything!" You cry out.
"Anything? Lay on your back."
You quickly do so.
"Now, watch as my foot slowly comes down onto you. Once its barley touching your small body, kiss my foot. If your lucky, I'll step to hard on you and you'll die quickly."
124.title: Attention Stomper

choices: she carries you toward the bedroom
she carries you to the bathroom
she puts you in her panties
1241.content:
You decide to run from Kristina.

You dash out from underneath her foot just before it comes down. You try to run to the exit, but she sees where you are going, and when you trip on a barely loose floor board, she walks two steps and picks up your helpless body. You try to struggle out of her hand but her iron grip is so strong that you are unable to do so.

"You disobeyed me. And for that you will pay. But first I'm gonna have some fun with you."
1241.title: Run?

13.content:
You're trapped in a jar that has breathing holes. You see you're on a table, in what you can only guess is someone's bedroom.

Just then the door opens...
13.title: Trapped in a jar

choices: She dumps you on the floor
She dumps you on her hand
131.content:
A tall, dark haired women stood in the frame. With quick but elegant strides she walked through the room directly in your direction. Her legs where bare and a long T-Shirt covered her to her hips. Her Hair was quickly bond in a ponytail and a beautiful smile decorated her pretty face. "Oh god, pls help me ma'am, I am trapped in here", you shout and bang against the glass of your prison but a look into her green eyes told you that she was not your saviour but more your host.

You backed away as fast as you could as the giantess moved closer very fast. As your back touched the cold glass you noticed for the first time that you are naked, which at the moment was secondary. She stood right in front of you without saying one single word and her two giant hands wrapped around the container before you where lifted up into the air. She got a closer look of you in there. Inspecting her prey. You felt even more naked than you are already as the green eyes inspected every inch of you. She sayed nothing but turned the jar and shook it from time to time to make you move. A human inspecting a trapped insect.
131.title: it's Kristina

info.brief_description: A story based off popular Giantess model Kristina. Vore, crush, capture, and more!
info.description:
If you are unaware of who this story is based off of, put in the search.bar at DeviantArt.com or GoogleImages "Giantess Kristina" and if you find pics of a Caucasian black haired Giantess, then you found who this story is about.

You suddenly awake in a house that is unfamiliar to you. Plus, being 2 inches tall doesn't help matters. And to add to that, a sadistic, yet beautiful, giant woman wants to kill every shrunk person in the area. Can you survive?
